Package DAGs

Class DAGMap<N,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • DAGs.DAGMap<N,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    N - the type of the node label
    V - the value type

    public class DAGMap<N,V>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is essentially a HashMap, but the keys are the labels of a DAG. One can put things into the map in the same way as in any other map.
    The difference is the get-Method. If get does not return a value immediately, it traverses the inner nodes of the DAG (breadth-first) to find a key with a corresponding value.

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        public void clear​()
        clears the map

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty​()
        Returns:
        true if the map is empty.

      • put

        public void put​(N key,
                V value)
        puts a key-value pair into the map.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the pair
        value - the value of the pair

      • get

        public V get​(N key)
        just gets the value fro the key from the map. The DAG is not involved.
        Parameters:
        key - for accessing the map
        Returns:
        the corresponding value in the map, or null

      • getFirst

        public V getFirst​(N key,
                  Direction direction,
                  boolean inner)
        traverses the DAG breadth-first to find the first value in the map.
        Parameters:
        key - the label in the DAG
        direction - the direction of the search (UP or DOWN)
        inner - if true then inner nodes are checked, otherwise leaf nodes.
        Returns:
        the first value which is found, or null if nothing is found.

      • getAll

        public java.util.ArrayList<V> getAll​(N key,
                                     Direction direction)
        traverses the inner nodes of the DAG breadth-first to find the nearest values in the map.
        Parameters:
        key - the label in the DAG
        direction - if true then the traversal is downwards, otherwise upwards
        Returns:
        the list of nearest values in the dag.

      • find

        public <W> W find​(N key,
                  Direction direction,
                  Strategy strategy,
                  java.util.function.Function<V,W> function)

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString​()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the map as a string

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString​(java.util.function.Function<N,java.lang.String> key2String,
                                 java.lang.String separator,
                                 java.util.function.Function<V,java.lang.String> value2String)
        turns the map into a string by applying different functions to key and value.
        Parameters:
        key2String - a function for mapping the keys to strings
        separator - separates key and value
        value2String - a function for mapping the values to strings.
        Returns:
        the generated string.
